message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $95. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go up to $92.50. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do better. I'm willing to go up to $89. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $90, but I'm not going below that. Is that a deal?
